00012   bool Utl::PointWithin( const Vector2& subject, Vector2 upper, Vector2 lower, bool sorted /*= true*/ )
00013   {
00014     if(!sorted)
00015     {
00016       Real temp;
00017       if(upper.x < lower.x)
00018       {
00019         temp = lower.x;
00020         upper.x = lower.x;
00021         upper.x = temp;
00022       }
00023       if(upper.y < lower.y)
00024       {
00025         temp = lower.y;
00026         upper.y = lower.y;
00027         upper.y = temp;
00028       }
00029     }
00030 
00031     if (subject.x < upper.x && subject.y < upper.y &&
00032       subject.x > lower.x && subject.y > lower.y)
00033     {
00034       return true;
00035     }
00036     return false;
00037   }

00040   {

00042     {
00043       Real temp;
00044       if(upper.x < lower.x)
00045       {
00046         temp = lower.x;
00047         upper.x = lower.x;
00048         upper.x = temp;
00049       }
00050       if(upper.y < lower.y)
00051       {
00052         temp = lower.y;
00053         upper.y = lower.y;
00054         upper.y = temp;
00055       }
00056       if(upper.z < lower.z)
00057       {
00058         temp = lower.z;
00059         upper.z = lower.z;
00060         upper.z = temp;
00061       }
00062     }
00063 
00064     if (subject.x < upper.x && subject.y < upper.y && subject.z < upper.z &&
00065       subject.x > lower.x && subject.y > lower.y && subject.z > lower.z )
00066     {
00067       return true;
00068     }
00069     return false;
00070   }

00072   //------------------------------------------------ Utl::DistanceToLine
00073   chain::Real Utl::DistanceToLine( const Vector3& point, const Vector3& lineA, const Vector3& lineB )
00074   {
00076 #if 1
00077     chain::Vector3 AB = lineB - lineA;
00078     chain::Real u = ((point - lineA)*AB) / AB.MagnitudeSquared();
00079 
00080     return (point - (lineA + AB*u)).Magnitude();
00081 #else
00082     return ((lineB - lineA)^(lineA)).Magnitude() / (lineB - lineA).Magnitude();
00083 #endif // 0
00084   }
00085 
00086   //------------------------------------------------ Utl::DistanceToLineSquared
00087   chain::Real Utl::DistanceToLineSquared( const Vector3& point, const Vector3& lineA, const Vector3& lineB )
00088   {
00089 #if 1
00090     chain::Vector3 AB = lineB - lineA;
00091     chain::Real u = ((point - lineA)*AB) / AB.MagnitudeSquared();
00092 
00093     return (point - (lineA + AB*u)).MagnitudeSquared();
00094 #else
00095     return ((lineB - lineA)^(lineA)).MagnitudeSquared() / (lineB - lineA).MagnitudeSquared();
00096 #endif
00097   }

00099   //------------------------------------------------ Utl::LineSphereIntersection
00100   bool Utl::LineSphereIntersection( const Vector3& lineA, const Vector3& lineB, const Vector3& sC, const Real& sR, Vector3* iA, Vector3* iB )
00101   {
00102     Real sR_sqrd = sR*sR;
00103     Real d_sqrd = DistanceToLineSquared(Vector3 (),lineA - sC,lineB - sC);
00104 
00105     if (d_sqrd > sR_sqrd)
00106       return false;
00107 
00108     Vector3 dirVect = (lineB - lineA).Normalise();
00109 
00110     Real m = CH_SQRT((sC - lineA).MagnitudeSquared() - d_sqrd);
00111     Real n = CH_SQRT(sR_sqrd - d_sqrd);
00112 
00113     *iA = lineA + dirVect * (m - n);
00114     *iB = lineA + dirVect * (m + n);
00115 
00116     return true;
00117   }

00119   //------------------------------------------------ Utl::EstimateRotationBetween
00120   chain::Real Utl::EstimateRotationBetween( const Quaternion& A, const Quaternion& B )
00121   {
00122     // get the W value of the quaternion between A and B
00123     // this is DIFF(A,B).w
00124     // = (B * -A).w
00125     // only calculate the w component
00126 
00127     return B.w*A.w + B.x*A.x + B.y*A.y + B.z*A.z;
00128   }
00129 
00130   //------------------------------------------------ Utl::EstimateRotationBetween
00131   chain::Real Utl::RotationBetween( const Quaternion& A, const Quaternion& B )
00132   {
00133     // get the W value of the quaternion between A and B
00134     // this is DIFF(A,B).w
00135     // = (B * -A).w
00136     // only calculate the w component
00137 
00138     return CH_ACOS(B.w*A.w + B.x*A.x + B.y*A.y + B.z*A.z) * 2;
00139   }

00141   //------------------------------------------------ Utl::ChordToArc
00142   chain::Real Utl::ChordToArc( const Real& chord, const Real& radius )
00143   {
00144     // chord length calculation:
00145     //    chord = 2*radius*sin(angle/2)
00146     //
00147     // arc length calculation:
00148     //    arc = angle*radius
00149     //
00150     // so, radius is fixed, angle varies. angle in respect to chord:
00151     //    angle = 2*asin(chord/2*radius)
00152     //
00153     // placing this in the arc equation:
00154     //    arc = 2*radius*asin(chord/2*radius)
00155 
00156     return 2 * radius * CH_ASIN (chord / (2*radius));
00157   }
00158 
00159   //------------------------------------------------ Utl::ArcToChord
00160   chain::Real Utl::ArcToChord( const Real& arc, const Real& radius )
00161   {
00162     // chord length calculation:
00163     //    chord = 2*radius*sin(angle/2)
00164     //
00165     // arc length calculation:
00166     //    arc = angle*radius
00167     //
00168     // so, radius is fixed, angle varies. angle in respect to arc:
00169     //    angle = arc/radius
00170     //
00171     // placing this in the chord equation:
00172     //    chord = 2*radius*sin(arc/2*radius)
00173 
00174     return 2 * radius * CH_SIN (arc / (2*radius));
00175   }
00176 
00177   //------------------------------------------------ Utl::ChordToAngle
00178   chain::Real Utl::ChordToAngle( const Real& chord, const Real& radius )
00179   {
00180     // chord length calculation:
00181     //    chord = 2*radius*sin(angle/2)
00182     //
00183     // angle in respect to chord:
00184     //    angle = 2*asin(chord/2*radius)
00185 
00186     return 2 * CH_ASIN (chord / (2*radius));
00187   }
00188 
00189   //------------------------------------------------ Utl::ArcToAngle
00190   chain::Real Utl::ArcToAngle( const Real& arc, const Real& radius )
00191   {
00192     // arc length calculation:
00193     //    arc = angle*radius
00194     //
00195     // angle in respect to arc:
00196     //    angle = arc/radius
00197 
00198     return arc / radius;
00199   }

00201   //------------------------------------------------ Utl::DistanceToLineSegment
00202   bool Utl::DistanceToLineSegment( const Vector3& point, const Vector3& lineA, const Vector3& lineB, Real& distance )
00203   {
00204     if (lineA == lineB)
00205       return false;
00206 
00207     chain::Vector3 AB = lineB - lineA;
00208     chain::Real u = ((point - lineA)*AB) / AB.MagnitudeSquared();
00209 
00210     if (u > 1 || u < 0)
00211       return false;
00212 
00213     distance = (point - (lineA + AB*u)).Magnitude();
00214 
00215     return true;
00216   }
00217 
00218   //------------------------------------------------ Utl::DistanceToLineSegmentSquared
00219   bool Utl::DistanceToLineSegmentSquared( const Vector3& point, const Vector3& lineA, const Vector3& lineB, Real& distance_squared )
00220   {
00221     if (lineA == lineB)
00222       return false;
00223 
00224     chain::Vector3 AB = lineB - lineA;
00225     chain::Real u = ((point - lineA)*AB) / AB.MagnitudeSquared();
00226 
00227     if (u > 1 || u < 0)
00228       return false;
00229 
00230     distance_squared = (point - (lineA + AB*u)).Magnitude();
00231 
00232     return true;
00233   }
